statements: DELETE FROM Artifact_Provenance WHERE authenticity = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Artifact_Provenance WHERE artifact_name = 'Sculpture' AND provenance = 'Italy';
DELETE FROM Artifact_Provenance WHERE provenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND current_location = 'Museum';

DELETE FROM artifact_locations WHERE artifact_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND date_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ArtifactsTransactions WHERE seller_id = 100 AND buyer_id = 200;
